ISSUE.TITLE: on_success: after_failure
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: In some other CI systems it's possible to set up notifications to only go out in the event of failure, or after a failure has been resolved. So `on_success: after_failure` would look at the previous build, see if it was a failure, and if so send a notification.
